title: CHAI INFUSED WHITE RUSSIAN COCKTAIL
directions: Place vodka and chai tea bags in a mason jar or glass bowl and let steep for a minimum of two hours. When vodka has finished infusing, remove tea bags and discard.
To make the cocktail, shake together the chai infused vodka, coffee liquor and heavy cream in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain and pour over 4 glasses filled with ice.
ingredients: 4 ounces coffee liquor such as Kahlua
